oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Buddy Lee Attractions Top Names in Talent (17152)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: festivals; Music festivals; Davis, Skeeter; Davis, Danny; Thunderkloud, Billy; Cash, Tommy; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Dove, Ronnie;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (blue and red on white) announcing Buddy Lee Attractions Top Names in Talent including Jack Blanchard and Misty Morgan, Skeeter Davis, Clat and Sally, June Hart, Danny Davis and Nashville Brass, Bob Sanders, Billy Thunderkloud and the Chieftones, Tommy Cash, Don Gibson, Carl Smith and Ronnie Dove. Poster features metal photoplates of each artist. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/31924.
